gullveig4.name: Gullveig
gullveig4.title: Hidden in Time
gullveig4.description: Future self, Gullveig, and past self, Kvasir. Two beings, whose destinies do not intersect, have come together.
gullveig4.duo:
(Duo Skills can be used once per map by tapping the Duo button. Duo Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
(When unit has a status or a skill that enables use of a
Style
, Duo Skills and Harmonized Skills cannot be used while unit can take an action (those skills can be used after unit has acted).)

Castle Hall: **Gullveig:** I share the same soul as Kvasir, so she and I should be able to perform covert tasks in perfect tandem.
**Gullveig:** I know the future, yet...I did not see myself this way.
**Kvasir:** If I remember correctly, Gullveig, ninja have signature sayings. For example..."Sparkling Shuriken."
**Kvasir:** Being with Gullveig, I feel...at peace. I am sure she does also...
**Kvasir:** I hear ninja erase their presence. Though, even if I wanted to, I could never hide Gullveig's radiance.
Visit: I will leave a gift in secret for you. And with that, our infiltration mission is complete, [F].
Level: **Kvasir:** I think that went well. Do you think we are worthy ninja now, Gullveig?
**Gullveig:** What I am now is a ninja...not the Golden Seer.
**Kvasir:** I am sorry... I could not keep up with Gullveig's radiance.
Summon: I am the Golden Seer. No... I am Gullveig, a ninja. Let us be on our way, Kvasir.
Learn Skill: **Kvasir:** May this power be a bridge from the past to the future...
Confession:
**Kvasir:** The secret message is not easy to find. I am afraid we will lose if nothing changes.
**Gullveig:** It is all right, Kvasir. Even if we do not claim it, this experience is not one often had.
You and I, future and past, would not have crossed paths. Yet here, we have spent time together.
For that, the summoner has my gratitude.
**Kvasir:** I feel the same. I will never forget this time we spent together, as ninja.
No matter what, we should be joyful to have worked together in this moment. "Sparkling Shuriken!"
Status: • Time's flow is again contravened—to bring us together.• I look forward to seeing what will happen now.
Conversation: **Gullveig:** It seems this secret message is also a fake.
If we do not claim the real thing soon, we will never win.
**Kvasir:** I have no wish to lose... We were invited by someone I do not want to disappoint.
I want to see that smiling face when we win.
**Gullveig:** I feel the same. But remember... Win or lose, we will receive our smile.
As long as we enjoy ourselves. That's just how the summoner is.
**Kvasir:** You are right. But I do want to win.
Do you think I'll get a pat on the head? And a little praise? I hope so.
**Gullveig:** That is a lovely idea. Do you suppose that I might receive the same?
**Kvasir:** I do not think so. You are an adult. I think it would be rude.
**Gullveig:** I see... Being an adult is not always good.
I am sure I can ask for a different reward.
**Gullveig:** Perhaps the summoner will grant me an embrace.
**Kvasir:** Not just for you! I want a hug too!
**Gullveig:** All this talk... And we have not yet located the secret message.
**Kvasir:** I am even more motivated now... I will win, no matter what!

hrid4.name: Hríd
hrid4.title: Frigid Ninja
hrid4.description: The eldest prince of Nifl, Kingdom of Ice. He's come to the festival dressed in ninja garb for the first time.

Castle Hall: Competing to find a secret note has my heart dancing with excitement. I shall gather some information first.
Some parts of Nifl could learn a thing or two from Askr's many and varied festivals.
As one to whom a kingdom has been entrusted, I understand how critical spies are for obtaining information.
I had heard about ninja garb like this from my sister. Hm... It is quite easy to move around in.
I heard ninja use fire and water techniques. I wonder, do they use any ice techniques?
Visit: I am Hríd, prince of Nifl. I hereby extend an invitation to the ninja festival at [F]'s.
Level: I gave it my all and, in my own way, I was able to perform as a ninja.
Cool and collected, like ice, hm? It seems the way of the ninja suits me.
I have found it difficult to erase my presence. All there is to do is train even harder.
Summon: I am Hríd, prince of Nifl. This is my first time acting as a ninja. I shall give it my all and enjoy myself.
Learn Skill: I am grateful. Now, I will be able to contribute even more as a spy.
Confession:
Have you ever seen Nifl's snowy landscape, [S]?
The snow falls in silence, and before you know it, everything is covered in a blanket of pure white...
Ninja are similar, approaching without making a sound and drastically changing the course of battle.
Afterward, they disappear without a trace... Just as snow melts away.
I have gained more knowledge of the ninja at this festival.
And I believe the techniques I have learned here will be useful in my travels throughout this land.
Status: I have no knowledge of the ninja, but I shall give it my all.
*startle* Ninja should remain hidden from their opponents, correct?
My sister participated in this and found it quite enjoyable. Do you think I will be able to enjoy it as much?
Ninja run on water? Hm... Do they freeze it?
This outfit is intriguing. I am fond of how easily I can move in it.
To think, exceptional spies like this exist in other worlds...
I am grateful to participate in this festival with you.

shez8.name: Shez
shez8.title: Covert Mercenary
shez8.description: An accomplished mercenary from Fódlan. Here, she takes part in the secret-missive scramble as a ninja. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

Castle Hall: I've accomplished many rescues, retreats, defensive missions... But, I don't recall any covert operations.
As a mercenary, I've had to hide from foes plenty of times. I'm used to concealing my presence.
I suspect Commander Anna may have the secret missive... I'll investigate her first.
This outfit's really for covert operations? Am I the only one who feels like it draws more attention?
Never thought I'd be at a festival competing against myself from another world. Hmph. I can't lose.
Visit: I'm Shez, a mercenary from Fódlan. There's a ninja festival happening at [F]'s castle.
Level: You're moving so slow. It's like you want me to defeat you.
Do I stand out too much? This ninja technique is difficult to grasp...
Summon: I'm Shez, a mercenary from Fódlan. So, my job here is to obtain a secret missive? I'm on it.
Learn Skill: It'll be interesting to grow as a ninja instead of as a mercenary.
Confession:
You're wide open! Time to take your life, [S]!
Ha! Just kidding. What'd you think? I played the part well, eh? I'm a pretty good ninja, right?
Even though I've accomplished so many missions, it's quite a change, takin' on ninja tasks.
Sabotaging, assassinating, gathering intel...all in secret. Ninja may have the power to change the course of battle.
It's the names of heroes, monarchs, and aristocrats that will go down in history. But it's ninja who affect it.
Makes me feel close to them. You see, mercenaries aren't remembered either, so we have that in common.
Status: So ninja are scouts and assassins? Very interesting.
A-ah... Already playing ninja, are you?
Getting to train while I'm at the festival is like killing two birds with one stone.
*yawn* I can't help but take a breather when I know I'm hidden.
Tah! Haa! I'm pretty good with ninja weapons too, eh?
This outfit's light so it's easy to move around in. I like it.
I'll secure your victory. I'm ready!

yunaka3.name: Yunaka
yunaka3.title: Stealthy Imitator
yunaka3.description: A wandering thief, trained in the art of ninja, who is enjoying the festival by making full use of her stealth and impersonation skills. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: All these shinobi around... I bet some are in disguise. Is the Hero you see really who you think they are?
They say there are people dressed like shinobi in Pale Sands on Elyos. I'm checking that out when I go back!
In a book of ninja techniques I found tactics with names like water-escape arts and fire-escape arts. Neat!
The Hoshidan-style outfits are great, but this is business as usual for me. Stay hidden and fulfill my mission!
As a shinobi, I put shuriken in my hair instead of stars. I can use 'em to fight in a pinch too!
Visit: Nin-zappy! I'm humble ninja Yunaka, bringing a secret missive for the lord here from [F]!
Level: I'd expect no less! I can throw my shuriken straight and true!
To be worthy of the title of shinobi, I must deliver reliable results!
Maybe I stood out a little too much. Not so nin-zappy...
Summon: Nin-zappy! Humble Yunaka here, in the form of a shinobi! Oops. Shinobi probably shouldn't shout, huh?
Learn Skill: Thanks! This will help with new battle strategies. A shinobi is stronger with lots of moves in their arsenal!
Confession:
Oh, Summoner! I've been thinking as I watch everyone enjoying the festival from over here.
Shinobi are odd. They hide, gather intelligence, and even assassinate... Yet this event is so flashy.
There was no "assassin's festival" where I'm from. Why would there be? Everyone loathes assassins.
I think shinobi operate from a place of more loyalty and faith. While I'd never glorifying killing, I must say...
the sight of shinobi fulfilling jobs for their lords is beautiful. If past me had that, at least, then...
No, never mind. I'm participating, and I'm going to enjoy this festival! Hiya papaya and nin-zappy, Summoner!
Status: Hehehe!
Could you detect my presence? Before I spoke to you, that is.
Aaah! Hey, stop poking at me! Want me to drop my hidden weapons?
I'm quite skilled at the ninja technique of hiding myself with invisibility magic. Want to see? Or...not see, I guess?
Shuriken, kunai, kusarigama... I am so excited about all these curious weapons!
I've heard Micaiah is a ninja too. I wonder where she is?
The main duties of a shinobi are intelligence gathering and...assassinations. Kind of reminds me of earlier days...
Feast your eyes on the art of disguise! I'll start by imitating the Divine Dragon's voice. "I am guided by the Emblems. Emblem Engage!"

shez9.name: Shez
shez9.title: Ninja Mercenary
shez9.description: A mercenary who has set foot on many a battlefield. Here, he challenges the secret missive scramble as a ninja. Appears in Fire Emblem Warriors: Three Hopes.

Castle Hall: Mercenaries need to be able to adapt the way ninja adjust to shifting situations. I could learn from them.
I once infiltrated enemy lines to stir chaos and confusion. That's a proper mercenary job, you know.
It's not just ninja who need to gather information and identify their foe's weaknesses. It's mercenaries too.
This ninja garb'll come in handy. I should be able to infiltrate anywhere without being noticed.
Another me is at this festival, eh? I'm sure I know what they've got up their sleeve, but I can't let my guard down.
Visit: I am Shez, a mercenary. I've been entrusted with inviting you to a ninja festival by [F].
Level: If I see an opening, I don't let it pass me by. That's how a ninja fights... Chakram Attack! You like it?
Deal the finishing blow without making a sound. That's the ninja way, right?
I went too far, huh? I'm not cut out for this...
Summon: I'm Shez, a mercenary from Fódlan. My job here is to make this ninja festival more exciting, eh?
Learn Skill: This power is necessary for a ninja. I'll use it with gratitude!
Confession:
I didn't end up finding the secret missive, after all... I feel like I let you down, [S].
However, I did manage to make this festival more exciting, right? I mean, people seemed to enjoy it.
The ninja techniques I learned here are different from my usual ones.
Gathering information, infiltrating the enemy, and fighting in unexpected ways are useful tactics in battle.
As long as I keep fighting, I'll never forget what I learned from this experience.
Even after I return to Fódlan, I will whisper, "Chakram Attack."
Status: Interesting festival. I'm itching to put my skills to the test here.
*react* I didn't see you there. Was that a ninja move?
Enjoying the festival while learning ninja techniques? Talk about a great deal.
Strange weapon, huh? You could really hurt yourself if you're not careful.
This outfit is comfortable. And warm, too.
Approaching the enemy without getting noticed? I guess ninja and mercenaries are the same that way.
For you, I'll carry out any mission.
